Valiant Management Services - Website Logo Implementation

Step 1: Download the Logo

Download the official logo file from the source:

üì• Download Logo (PNG)
Save the file as logo.png (lowercase, no spaces).

Step 2: Create Folder Structure

Place the logo files inside the public/images folder:

üìÅ public/
    üìÅ images/
        üìÑ logo.png   ‚Üê Main logo for Navbar & Footer
        üìÑ favicon.png   ‚Üê Square icon for browser tab (32x32px)

How to Create a Favicon

  1. Open the logo in any image editor (Photoshop, Paint, Canva)
  2. Crop/resize to a square (32x32 pixels or 64x64 pixels)
  3. Save as favicon.png
  4. Place in public/images/ folder

Step 3: Navbar Logo Code

The logo in navbar is implemented in src/components/Header.tsx:

<Link to="/">
  <img 
    src="/images/logo.png" 
    alt="Valiant Management Services" 
    className="nav-logo"
  />
</Link>

CSS for responsive logo (in src/index.css):

/* Navbar Logo - Responsive */
.nav-logo {
  max-height: 40px;    /* Mobile */
  width: auto;
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .nav-logo {
    max-height: 56px;  /* Tablet */
  }
}

@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .nav-logo {
    max-height: 64px;  /* Desktop */
  }
}

Step 4: Footer Logo Code

The logo in footer is implemented in src/components/Footer.tsx:

<Link to="/">
  <img 
    src="/images/logo.png" 
    alt="Valiant Management Services" 
    className="footer-logo"
  />
</Link>
/* Footer Logo */
.footer-logo {
  max-width: 200px;
  height: auto;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

Step 5: Favicon Setup

In index.html, add these lines inside the <head> section:

<!-- Favicon - Browser Tab Icon -->
<link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="32x32" href="/images/favicon.png">
<link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="16x16" href="/images/favicon.png">

<!-- Apple Touch Icon (for iOS) -->
<link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="180x180" href="/images/logo.png">

<!-- Fallback -->
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="/images/favicon.png">

Recommended Image Sizes

Usage Recommended Size Format
Navbar Logo 300 x 80 px (or similar ratio) PNG (with transparency)
Footer Logo 300 x 80 px PNG (with transparency)
Favicon 32 x 32 px or 64 x 64 px PNG or ICO
Apple Touch Icon 180 x 180 px PNG
Open Graph (Social) 1200 x 630 px PNG or JPG

Final Checklist

  • Logo file saved in public/images/logo.png
  • Favicon file saved in public/images/favicon.png
  • Logo visible in Navbar
  • Logo visible in Footer
  • Favicon visible in browser tab
  • Logo scales properly on mobile (test on phone)
  • Logo scales properly on tablet
  • Logo scales properly on desktop
  • No broken image icons
  • Logo links to homepage when clicked
After completing all steps, clear your browser cache (Ctrl+Shift+Delete) and refresh the page (Ctrl+F5) to see the changes.

Troubleshooting

Logo Not Showing?

  1. Check file path is correct: /images/logo.png
  2. Ensure file is in public/images/ folder
  3. Verify file extension matches (.png not .PNG)
  4. Clear browser cache and refresh

Favicon Not Updating?

  1. Favicons are heavily cached by browsers
  2. Try opening in Incognito/Private window
  3. Clear all browser data (not just cache)
  4. Try a different browser to confirm

Logo Too Large or Too Small?

  1. Adjust the CSS max-height values
  2. For navbar: Edit .nav-logo in CSS
  3. For footer: Edit .footer-logo in CSS
  4. Use responsive breakpoints for different screens

Quick Commands

Action Path / File
Edit Navbar Logo src/components/Header.tsx
Edit Footer Logo src/components/Footer.tsx
Edit Favicon index.html
Edit Logo CSS src/index.css
Add Logo Files public/images/
